fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Climate Action, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: HLEG on Sustainable Finance and all other legislative measures and projects with regard to Sustainable Finance in the EU (e.g. CSR-directive-Review, Directives IORPII and Shareholder Rights, ESA-Review, PRIIPS)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Forum Nachhaltige Geldanlagen (FNG), founded in 2001, is the industry association promoting sustainable investment in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. It has over 160 corporate members, including banks, investment management companies, insurance companies, rating agencies, investment companies, asset managers, financial advisers and NGOs, and around 30 individual members.
relevant_communication: annual study on the market for Sustainable Investment in Germany, Austria and Switzerland/ Transparency Code Auditing for Sustainable Investment Products/ Development of a label for Sustainable Funds as quality standard (granting via GNG)/ Advocacy: recommendations/ position papers on Sustainable Finance for policy-makers
